name: MC_NOTIFICATIONS
description: This table contains information relating to Tapestry notifications sent to members.

columns.name: OUTREACH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the outreach record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The premium billing account record ID associated with the member for this communication.

columns.name: PAYMENT_ID
columns.description: The premium payment record ID associated with the communication to the member.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The premium invoice record ID related to the communication being sent to the member.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage record ID related to the communication being sent to the member.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The estimate record ID related to the communication being sent to the member.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim record ID related to the communication being sent to the member.

columns.name: EOB_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The periodic Explanation of Benefits document record ID associated with the communication being sent.
